Create fake chat conversation and download it as a video
text:
Just created this app, it lets you create fake chat and then download video of the entire chat in mp4 format.

You control both sides in conversation. I personally needed something like this but couldn't find anything on the web that can generate video of the conversation.

Before I push it to production, I would like to hear some feedback from you, is this something you would want to use?

I will attach link to resulting demo video here for anyone interested. http://chattlr.com/demo.mp4

Ask HN: How to protect against future cancellation and social credit systems?
text:
I'm increasingly worried about being cancelled or wrongly flagged by a social credit system in near future.

I've started minimising what I share, limiting scope of my personal opinions, moving close people to privacy friendly platforms to chat about any sensitive topics, scrubbing old information, using cash and setting up basic privacy hygiene.
